column1: '''Tauremorna''' is one of the names of the [[Fangorn Forest]], used by [[Treebeard]] in his song ''[[In The Willow-meads Of Tasarinan
column2: In the Willow-meads of Tasarinan I Walked in the Spring]]''. The other names mentioned by Treebeard are [[Ambaróna]] and [[Aldalómë]].<ref>{{TT

column3: UI}}, p. 385</ref> likely composed of [[Quenya]] ''[[taure]]'' ("forest") + ''[[morna]]'' ("dark, black").
